actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.
Committee on Finance. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure H.R. 3398 ordered to be reported.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 regarding the country of origin marking requirements for certain imported pipe, pipe fittings, and compressed gas cylinders.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to require that the following articles be marked with the English name of the country where they were manufactured: (1) specified imported pipes or pipe fittings made of iron or steel; (2) compressed gas cylinders; and (3) imported manhole rings or frames, covers, and assemblies thereof.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 regarding the country of origin marking requirements for certain imported pipe, pipe fittings, and compressed gas cylinders.
